description: Test script for responsive UI layout using Playwright

methods.name: test.describe
methods.description: Defines a suite of related tests for responsive layout

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual test case for rendering columns and content at mobile width

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertions to verify element visibility and layout

methods.name: page.setViewportSize
methods.description: Sets the viewport size to emulate mobile device dimensions

methods.name: await gotoHome(page)
methods.description: Navigates to the home page of the application being tested

methods.name: getBoard
methods.description: Retrieves the board element from the page

methods.name: getColumn
methods.description: Retrieves a specific column element based on its label
